title: Cloudflare launches new policy to stop Google AI from using website content without consent
description: Cloudflare has introduced its Content Signals Policy, which will not allow website owners to set boundaries on how Google and other artificial intelligence systems handle their published material.
content: Cloudflare is introducing a new policy that directly targets Google’s AI operations, particularly its AI Overviews feature. Google has been called out many times by publishers for using their content without authorisation to train AI and across the w... [2716 chars]

title: Rancho Cordova makes pushes to become hub for AI research
description: A Sacramento-area city is making a multi-million-dollar push to become a new hub for artificial intelligence research.
content:

title: China flash memory maker YMTC plans to enter the DRAM market, sources say
description: China's top flash memory chipmaker Yangtze Memory Technologies Co (YMTC) is planning to expand into manufacturing DRAM chips including advanced versions that are used to make artificial intelligence chipsets, three people with knowledge of the matter said.
